name: Reebelo
description: Reebelo consists of a team of experienced people who have expertise in electronics and second-hand business. Reebelo buy used electronics from business partners as well as from private individuals for their repair team to renew the electronics and test them, before they put them back on sale on their marketplace. On top of that, Reebelo takes care of planting a tree for every device that they sell to make the world a greener and a cooler place.
